page.title: 18INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {Mrs. Meg Warren} =============== She is an European and International Judge and coach.She is the head of women gymnastics in the East Midlands. She has lived in Burbage for 8 years and has been a gymnast since she was 10.Her jobs are drawing gymnastic figurines for coaching,floor exercises and for books.She has travelled to many countries including Russia, Czechoslovakia ,U.S.A. ,and Europe to judge competitions. She has never won any major contest but she has coached people who have. She writes books and articles for the International Gymnastic magazine and the Gymnast.She kindly visits the Junior school in her spare time to teach gymnastics to any people who are interested.
